samples.context: Pasteurella pestis endoparasite of gut of rat flea (which is an ectoparasite of rat and mouse).
samples.question: What is the role of the rat flea?

samples.context: Head louse (Pediculus) and bedbug (Cimex) may also transmit the germs from man to man.
samples.question: Which insects can transmit the plague to humans?
